segment.source: How to install the Internet Explorer 11 update using System Center 2012 R2 Configuration Manager
segment.target: How to install the Internet Explorer 11 update using System Center 2012 R2 Configuration Manager

segment.source: Install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) using System Center 2012 R2 Configuration Manager (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) using System Center 2012 R2 Configuration Manager (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) using System Center 2012 R2 Configuration Manager
segment.target: Install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) using System Center 2012 R2 Configuration Manager

segment.source: You can install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) by using System Center R2 2012 Configuration Manager.
segment.target: You can install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) by using System Center R2 2012 Configuration Manager.

segment.source: Complete these steps for each operating system and platform combination.
segment.target: Complete these steps for each operating system and platform combination.

segment.source: Download and approve the System requirements and language support for Internet Explorer 11 (IE11).
segment.target: Download and approve the System requirements and language support for Internet Explorer 11 (IE11).

segment.source: Create a software distribution package that includes the IE11 installation package.
segment.target: Create a software distribution package that includes the IE11 installation package.

segment.source: Create a program that includes the command-line needed to run the IE11 installation package.
segment.target: Create a program that includes the command-line needed to run the IE11 installation package.

segment.source: To run the package silently, without restarting and without checking the Internet for updates, use:.
segment.target: To run the package silently, without restarting and without checking the Internet for updates, use:.

segment.source: Move the installation package to your distribution points, and then advertise the package.
segment.target: Move the installation package to your distribution points, and then advertise the package.

segment.source: You can also use System Center Essentials 2010 to deploy IE11 installation packages.
segment.target: You can also use System Center Essentials 2010 to deploy IE11 installation packages.

segment.source: For info, see System Center Essentials 2010 and the System Center Essentials 2010 Operations Guide.
segment.target: For info, see System Center Essentials 2010 and the System Center Essentials 2010 Operations Guide.
